innhold.avsnitt: If only the father or co-mother is entitled to parental benefit, we include income right up until the father or co-mother starts their parental benefit period. In order not to lose days of parental benefit, you must start drawing parental benefit no later than week 7 after the child was born.

If you want to start receiving parental benefit later than seven weeks after the child was born, you must apply to postpone your parental benefit before seven weeks have passed since the child was born.
